```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```


```{r data_selection}
data("rest_inspec")
rest_inspec =
  rest_inspec %>%
  mutate(boro = str_to_title(boro)) %>% 
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"), boro == "Manhattan") %>%
  relocate(boro) %>% 
  sample_n(10000) %>% 
  view
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r scatterplot}
rest_inspec %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Score: ", score, "\nGrade: ", grade)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~inspection_date, y = ~score, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    color = ~grade, text = ~text_label, alpha = 0.5)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r boxplot}
rest_inspec %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~score, color = ~cuisine_description, type = "box", colors = "viridis", showlegend = FALSE)
```

### Chart C

```{r barchart}
rest_inspec %>% 
  count(cuisine_description) %>% 
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~cuisine_description, y = ~n, color = ~cuisine_description, type = "bar", colors = "viridis", showlegend = FALSE)
```
